verses.content: Chun, chuong lai vêl chun Lal Herod chun kohrana mi ṭhenkhat suknawmnat tumin a kut ân let tah a.
Jakob, Johan unau chu, kâwl- hnâmin a sâthlum a.
Chu chun Judahai chu a suklâwm ti a hrietin, Peter khawm chu man a tum nâwk pei a. (Chuong nihai chu Chawlṭhanglo Bei ruoiṭhe ni a nih).
chun, a man hnung chun intângna inah a khum a, sipai pâwl li, pali seng peiin, ân vêng sâwktir a; Fekân Ruoiṭhe zoa mi po po kuoma ṭhuoi suok a tum a na.
Chuleiin, Peter chu intângna inah ân umtir hrih a; nisienlakhawm, kohranhaiin ama ta dingin ṭha- hnemngaitakin Pathien kuomah an ṭawngṭaipêk hlak a.
Chun, Herod chun a ṭhuoi suok tâwmin, chu zân tak chun Peter chu sipai pahni inkârah khaidiet pahni bunin a in a, a vêngtuhai khawm kawtkhâr bulah an um a, intângna in chu an vêng a.

Chun, ngai ta, Lalpa vântirko pakhat a kâwlah a hung ngîr a, rip sûnga chun var ieng amanih a hung var a, Peter nâkah a khîk har a, “Tho vak rawh,” a ta. Chun, a khaidiethai chu a kuta chu a tla tah a.
Vântirko chun a kuomah, “Dier kei la, i kekawk bun rawh,” a ta. Ama chun chuong ang chun a thawh a. Chun vântirko chun a kuomah, “I puon bât ṭha la, mi zui rawh,” a ta.
Peter chu a suok a, a zui tah a; vântirko chângzie chu a tak a ni ti a hriet nawh a, manga a hmu amanih a sâwn lem a.

Chun, vêngtu hmasa le a dawttu chu an khêl hnung chun, tuol suokna ding thîr kawtkhâr chu an va tlung a, chu chu an ta dingin ân hawng fâwm tah a; an suok a, kawtthlêr pakhat an khêl a; chun, vântirko chun a fe san nghâl tah a.
Chun, Peter chu a har phingleh, “Lalpain a vântirko a tir suok a, Herod kut le Juda mihai beiseina po poa inthawkin a mi sandam ti tuhin indiktakin ka hriet tah,” a ta.
Chun, ân ngaituo zo chun, Johan, Marka an ti, chu mipa nu Mari ina chun a va feh a; chutaka chun ṭawngṭaiin mi tamtak an lo um khâwm a.
Chun, tuolpûk kawtkhâr a hei nawk phingleh, a hming Rodi, nunghâk pakhat, dawn dingin a va feh a.
Peter rawl a hriet phingleh, a lâwm leiin kawt chu hawng loin a tlân lût nâwk ta lem a, “Peter chu kawtkhâr bulah a ngîr” tiin a va hril a.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chun a kuomah, “în vêt a ni ta hi,” an lo tih a. Ama ruok chu, “Titakzet a nih,” tiin a ṭhang ṭal a. Anni chun, “A vântirko a ni chu,” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Peter chun a nawk zing a; chun, an hei hawng chun, ama chu an hmuh a, mak an ti hleh a.

Chuongchun, ama chun an tona dingin kutin a zâp a, Pathienin intângna ina inthawka a ṭhuoi suokzie chu a hril tah a. Chun, “Hieng thu hi Jakob le unauhai kuomah va hril ro,” a ta. Chun, a suok a, ram dangah a fe tah a.
Chun, nisa a suok phingleh, sipaihai chu, “Peter khâwlai am a um tah a?” tiin buoi namênin an buoi nawh a.
Herod chun a zawng a, a hmu si nawh a, a vêngtuhai chu a suosal a, sukhlum dingin thu a pêk tah a. Chun, Herod chu Judai rama inthawkin Kaisari khuoah a zu feh a, chutaka chun a um zing a.

Herod chu, Tura le Sidon khuoa mihai chunga chun a lungninaw bêk bêk a. Anni chun, Blasta, lal khum vêngtu chu, an ruolah an siem a, inthuruolin a kuomah an hung a, an khuo tiengin lal khuo tienga pûr inchaw hlak an ni leiin inrem an ngên a.
A ni tiem ni chun, Herod chun lal puon a sil a, lalṭhungphaah a ṭhung a, an kuomah thu a hril a.
Mi po po chun, “Pathien rawl a ni hi, mihriem rawl a ni naw hi,” an ta, an khêk a.
Ama chun Pathien kuomah chawimawina chu a pêk naw leiin Lalpa vântirkoin kârloah a man a, rulrukûtin a fâk a, a thi tah a.
Pathien thu ruok chu, ân dâr a, a pung ta pei a.
Chun, Barnaba le Saula chun, rawng chu an bâwl zo chun, Jerusalema inthawk chun an kîr nâwk tah a, Johan, Marka an ti chu an kuomah an ṭhuoi veh a.
